revised_title: Archaeological Discoveries at Herculaneum and Naples
tldr: In this letter, Camillo Paderni describes the archaeological discoveries made at Herculaneum and Naples, including statues, mosaics, and other artifacts. He discusses the excavation process and the preservation of these ancient treasures in galleries and museums. Paderni also mentions the discovery of a large garden and palace, as well as various fountains and other decorative elements.
